CustomField.description: If true, then a record on an object can create a record-level folder in SharePoint. Disallow if a child object points to parent object's SP folder.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If true, then a record on an object can create a record-level folder in SharePoint. Disallow if a child object points to parent object's SP folder.
CustomField.label: (Deprecated) Initial folder creation
